name: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.
description: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. is a global cruise company that operates the Norwegian Cruise Line, Oceania Cruises, and Regent Seven Seas Cruises brands. Founded in 1966 and headquartered in Miami, Florida, the company has established itself as a leader in providing innovative and diverse cruise experiences to travelers around the world. Norwegian Cruise Line is known for its Freestyle Cruising concept, which offers guests the flexibility to choose when and where to dine, along with a wide array of entertainment options and onboard activities. Oceania Cruises focuses on destination-oriented voyages, featuring upscale amenities and gourmet dining experiences, while Regent Seven Seas Cruises is renowned for its all-inclusive luxury cruises, ensuring guests enjoy a premium travel experience. With a fleet of modern ships that sail to over 400 destinations worldwide, Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings is committed to delivering exceptional service and unforgettable vacations. The company continually invests in enhancing its fleet and expanding its offerings to cater to the evolving preferences of cruise travelers, including sustainable practices and innovative technology to reduce environmental impact.

seo.meta_title: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. | Innovative Cruise Experiences
seo.meta_description: Explore Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd., a leader in the cruise industry offering diverse travel experiences through its three premier cruise brands.

faq.question: What types of cruises does Norwegian Cruise Line offer?
faq.answer: Norwegian Cruise Line offers a range of cruises including Freestyle Cruising, luxury cruises, and destination-oriented voyages.

faq.question: Where is Norwegian Cruise Line headquartered?
faq.answer: Norwegian Cruise Line is headquartered in Miami, Florida, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Norwegian Cruise Line?
faq.answer: Frank Del Rio is the CEO of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.

faq.question: When was Norwegian Cruise Line founded?
faq.answer: Norwegian Cruise Line was founded in 1966.
